unittitle_ssm: Edward J. Roberts last will and testament
abstract_ssm: The last will and testament of Edward J. Roberts, written September 6, 1883 and proved April 2, 1884. The document was issued by the Kings County Surrogate Court and signed by the Court Clerk.
